title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of homicides, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Number of homicides has increased over the Year.
Number of homicides is roughly constant from 2006 to 2012, roughly decreasing from 2012 to 2014, and lastly slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Number of homicides about 11006.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of homicides about 7803.0 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of homicides, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2012.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
